**Title:** Roof Repair Weight-Program Rooms - JI
================UPER Info

**Reference Number:** cb-20-81301426
**Solicitation Number:** 21450-25-4635257

**Tender Status:** Expired
**Posting Date:** 2024-02-22

**Synopsis:** The Correctional Service of Canada, Joyceville Institution, intends to conclude a contract for the repair of roof systems in designated areas of the facility.

**Scope:** The objective of this project is to remove and dispose of the existing roofing system and install a new torch-applied Modified Bitumen roofing system as per drawings and specifications. The successful bidder will be responsible for completing all work detailed in the attached drawings and specifications.

**Unspsc:** 
* 25174100: Roof systems
* 72101601: Roofing installation or repair
* 72152600: Roofing and siding and sheet metal services
* 72152601: Roofing service

**Standards Canada:** Edifice ly Suplys English

**Key Deliverables:**

1. Completion of all work detailed in the attached drawings and specifications.
2. Removal and disposal of existing roofing system.
3. Removal and disposal of all existing ballast.
4. Removal and reinstatement of associated mechanical and electrical services.
5. Supply and installation of a new Modified Bitumen roofing system.

**Duration:** The contract shall be completed within sixteen (16) weeks from the date of contract award.

**Submission Information:**

* Tender documents are available on the Canada Buys website.
* Bidders can submit their tenders in either English or French.
* After contract award, bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process.
